name: Bells scale
description:
This is a short virtual sound installation to demonstrate the possibilities of my bell scale. It's a system of two 13-tone microtuned scales representing a spectrum of any church bell.

Use the scroll wheel to change the amount of light and the middle mouse button as an on/off switch.

WASD to move, Spacebar to jump.

When you pass under the large ghost church bell, you can hear an original sound. All other sounds are fully synthesized in the Native Instruments FM8 synth.
